subject: Football
lead_paragraph: DeAngelo Williams scored on his fourth 1-yard touchdown run with 1 minute 30 seconds left after a long kickoff return by Mark Jones and a big gain by Steve Smith on a deep pass from Jake Delhomme.
snippet: DeAngelo Williams scored on his fourth 1-yard touchdown run with 1 minute 30 seconds left after a long kickoff return by Mark Jones and a big gain by Steve Smith on a deep pass from Jake Delhomme.
